name: Product

learningMaterials.title: Getting Started with ImpactIQ
learningMaterials.introduction: Quick start guide for governance and impact analysis
learningMaterials.description: Learn how to set up ImpactIQ for automated Power BI governance, impact analysis, and metadata extraction across your Fabric environment.

createExperience.description: Create and manage Power BI governance and impact analysis items

cards.title: Governance Analyzer

productDetail.slogan: Be smarter with every change - Power BI Governance Made Easy
productDetail.description: ImpactIQ provides automated governance, impact analysis, and comprehensive metadata extraction for Power BI and Fabric environments. Identify downstream impacts of model changes, discover unused objects, and maintain a clear view of your entire analytics environment.
